title: Executive Order 6577-A-Authorization to Appoint Miss Will Harris
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of the last sentence of the eighth paragraph of subdivision second of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Miss Will Harris may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with the requirements of the Civil Service rules.
This order is recommended by the Secretary of State.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6577-A-Authorization to Appoint Miss Will Harris Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362339
